lead_paragraph: COWIN--Daniel. It has been 24 years since you left us. Those who were acquainted with you miss your intelligence, quiet manner, empathy and friendship. For those of us who knew you best, we miss you on a daily basis. Your kindness, intense support of our endeavors, wisdom, taste, patience and innate strength of character. Would that you could return to us! With love, Kenneth, Andrew, Dana and Joyce 1/3
